name: 王正豪
objective: 本課程為大學部的巨量資料分析導論基礎課程，主要介紹資料前處理、資料探勘概念、關聯分析、分類、分群、平行化程式設計、分散式計算、以及實際分析平台工具如: MapReduce, Spark 等。除了基本概念的介紹外，透過程式練習以及期末專題，能讓學生深入理解巨量資料分析的基本原理以及實際工具的運用。
schedule:
Part I: Data mining concepts (8 wks)
1. Introduction to big data & preprocessing (1 wk)
2. Frequent pattern mining (2 wks)
3. Data classification (2 wks)
4. Data clustering (2 wks)
5. Midterm exam (1 wk)

Part II: Distributed platforms & Parallel programming (6 wks)
1. Introduction to distributed platforms: Hadoop & Spark  (1 wk)
2. Parallel programming paradigm & concepts (1 wk)
3. MapReduce programming: pairs & stripes, relational algebra (2 wks)
4. More examples: matrix multiplication, similarity (2 wks)

Term project presentation (4 wks)
scorePolicy:
Homework assignments and programming exercises: ~40%
Mid-term exam: ~25-30%
Term project and presentation: ~30-35%
materials:
- Textbooks:
1. Jiawei Han, Micheline Kamber, and Jian Pei, Data Mining: Concepts and Techniques, 3rd edition, Morgan Kaufmann, 2011.
2. Jimmy Lin and Chris Dyer, Data-Intensive Text Processing with MapReduce, 
Morgan & Claypool Publishers, 2010.

- References:
1. Jure Leskovec, Anand Rajaraman, Jeff Ullman, Mining of Massive Datasets,  2nd edition, Cambridge University Press, 2014.
2. Recent academic papers, tutorials, and slides.

- Latest information available soon at: https://myweb.ntut.edu.tw/~jhwang/BDA/
